nodes.documentation:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.
 * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to
the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by
simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
 * Attribution: Modified from OpenZeppelin Pausable.sol
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Emitted when the pause is triggered by a pauser (`account`).
nodes.name: Paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Emitted when the pause is lifted by a pauser (`account`).
nodes.name: Unpaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role
to the deployer.
@dev Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
nodes.name: paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state. Only owners can pause.
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state. Only owners can unpause.
nodes.name: unpause

devdoc.details: Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account. * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place. * Attribution: Modified from OpenZeppelin Pausable.sol

constructor.details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role to the deployer.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state. Only owners can pause.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state. Only owners can unpause.
